## OperationInfo type

`OperationInfo` represents the information of an operation. It is used to inform to the user what kind of operation was executed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OperationInfo = AddOpInfo | IncreaseOpInfo | RemoveOpInfo | SetOpInfo | MoveOpInfo | EditOpInfo | StyleOpInfo | SelectOpInfo;
```
